segments.source_content:
---
title: DocSearch migration
authors: [shortcuts, slorber]
tags: [search]
image: ./img/social-card.png
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: [DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/) is migrating to a new, more powerful system, which gives users their own Algolia application and new credentials.

translations.zh-CN: [DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/) 正在迁移至一个更强大的新系统，该系统将为用户提供专属的 Algolia 应用和新的凭证。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus site owners should upgrade their configuration with their new credentials **by February 1, 2022**, existing search indexes will be frozen and become read-only after this date.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 站点所有者需在 **2022年2月1日之前** 使用新凭证升级配置，此后现有搜索索引将被冻结并转为只读模式。

segments.source_content: <!--truncate-->

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b7b09f68

segments.source_content: ## Upgrading your Docusaurus site

translations.zh-CN: ## 升级您的 Docusaurus 站点

segments.source_content: In the next few weeks, Docusaurus site owners will receive an email inviting them to join their personal Algolia application.

translations.zh-CN: 未来几周内，Docusaurus 站点所有者将收到加入其专属 Algolia 应用的邀请邮件。

segments.source_content: This email will include a new `appId` and `apiKey` to use in your Docusaurus configuration.

translations.zh-CN: 该邮件将包含用于 Docusaurus 配置的新 `appId` 和 `apiKey`。

segments.source_content: The only things you have to do:

translations.zh-CN: 您只需完成以下操作：

segments.source_content:
- Join the Algolia application (eventually creating a new Algolia account)
- Update your site configuration.

translations.zh-CN:
- 加入 Algolia 应用（可能需要创建新 Algolia 账户）
- 更新站点配置。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3569d545

segments.source_content:
:::info

`appId` is now **required**.

These keys are not secrets and can be added to your Git repository.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

`appId` 现为**必填项**。

这些密钥并非敏感信息，可提交至 Git 仓库。

:::

segments.source_content: ## DocSearch has a new home!

translations.zh-CN: ## DocSearch 有了新家！

segments.source_content: ### What is DocSearch?

translations.zh-CN: ### 什么是 DocSearch？

segments.source_content: [DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/) is a program created by [Algolia](http://algolia.com/), which offers search to technical documentation of Open Source projects and technical blogs **for free**.

translations.zh-CN: [DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/) 是由 [Algolia](http://algolia.com/) 创建的项目，**免费**为开源项目技术文档和技术博客提供搜索服务。

segments.source_content: You can [read more here](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/what-is-docsearch/), and [apply](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply) if you'd like to give it a try!

translations.zh-CN: 您可[在此了解更多](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/what-is-docsearch/)，若想尝试可[立即申请](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply)！

segments.source_content: ## What is this migration about?

translations.zh-CN: ## 本次迁移涉及哪些内容？

segments.source_content: ### Motivation

translations.zh-CN: ### 迁移动机

segments.source_content: With the upcoming stable release of [DocSearch UI](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/DocSearch-v3), we wanted to go further and provide better tooling for our users to improve their search, but also leverage the full potential of Algolia.

translations.zh-CN: 随着 [DocSearch UI](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/DocSearch-v3) 稳定版的发布，我们希望进一步提供更强大的工具，帮助用户优化搜索体验并充分发挥 Algolia 的全部潜力。

segments.source_content: ### What's new?

translations.zh-CN: ### 新增功能

segments.source_content: DocSearch now leverages the [Algolia Crawler](https://www.algolia.com/products/search-and-discovery/crawler/), which includes a web interface that will allow you to:

translations.zh-CN: DocSearch 现采用 [Algolia 爬虫](https://www.algolia.com/products/search-and-discovery/crawler/)，其网页界面支持您：

segments.source_content:
- Start, schedule and monitor your crawls
- Edit your config file from a live editor
- Test your results with DocSearch v3

translations.zh-CN:
- 启动、调度和监控爬取任务
- 通过实时编辑器修改配置文件
- 使用 DocSearch v3 测试搜索结果

segments.source_content: ![The Algolia crawler front page showing the project's overview, such as last complete crawl and indices](./img/crawler-overview.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Algolia 爬虫首页展示项目概览，包括最近完整爬取记录和索引](./img/crawler-overview.png)

segments.source_content: ![The Algolia config editor opened to the docusaurus-2 config. The right pane shows the results for index and various facet filters.](./img/editor.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Algolia 配置编辑器打开 docusaurus-2 配置。右侧面板显示索引结果和各类分面筛选器](./img/editor.png)

segments.source_content: But also, more Algolia features in **your own Algolia app**:

translations.zh-CN: 此外，您的专属 Algolia 应用还支持更多功能：

segments.source_content:
- Team management
- Browse and see how your records are indexed in Algolia
- Try other Algolia features with free trials

translations.zh-CN:
- 团队管理
- 浏览并查看记录在 Algolia 中的索引方式
- 免费试用其他 Algolia 功能

segments.source_content: ![The Algolia index overview page, showing various filters and the details of every single index](./img/index-overview.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Algolia 索引概览页，展示各类筛选器及每个索引的详细信息](./img/index-overview.png)

segments.source_content: ![The Algolia index analytics page, showing trends for total users, total searches, etc.](./img/index-analytics.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Algolia 索引分析页，显示总用户数、总搜索量等趋势数据](./img/index-analytics.png)

segments.source_content: And of course, **a lot more, for free**.

translations.zh-CN: 当然，还有**更多免费功能**。

segments.source_content: ## FAQ

translations.zh-CN: ## 常见问题

segments.source_content: ### I'm using Docusaurus and DocSearch, can I migrate? {#im-using-docusaurus-and-docsearch-can-i-migrate}

translations.zh-CN: ### 我正在使用 Docusaurus 和 DocSearch，能否迁移？ {#im-using-docusaurus-and-docsearch-can-i-migrate}

segments.source_content: At the time we are writing this, we are still at an early stage of the migration. We are doing small batches every week but will increase the load shortly, so please be patient and keep an eye out in your mailbox, you'll be contacted as soon as your Algolia app is ready!

translations.zh-CN: 本文撰写时，我们仍处于迁移早期阶段。目前每周处理少量批次，但将很快扩大规模，请保持耐心并留意邮箱通知，您的 Algolia 应用准备就绪后我们会立即联系您！

segments.source_content: ### Where can I read more about this?

translations.zh-CN: ### 在哪里可以了解更多信息？

segments.source_content: We wrote a small [migration guide](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy) but you'll have more detailed information in the migration email.

translations.zh-CN: 我们编写了一份简短的[迁移指南](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy)，但您将在迁移邮件中获得更详细的信息。

segments.source_content: ### I received the migration email but the invite expired

translations.zh-CN: ### 我收到了迁移邮件但邀请已过期

segments.source_content: Please contact us via either [email](mailto:docsearch@algolia.com) or [DocSearch's Discord](https://discord.gg/bRTacwYrfX) or on [Docusaurus's Discord #algolia channel](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus)

translations.zh-CN: 请通过[邮件](mailto:docsearch@algolia.com)、[DocSearch的Discord](https://discord.gg/bRTacwYrfX)或[Docusaurus的Discord #algolia频道](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus)联系我们

segments.source_content: ### I have feedback!

translations.zh-CN: ### 我有反馈意见！

segments.source_content: For any feedback regarding our documentation or the DocSearch UI component, you can open an issue [on our GitHub repository](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch/issues), but also contact us via the methods above.

translations.zh-CN: 对于文档或DocSearch UI组件的任何反馈，您可以在[GitHub仓库提交issue](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch/issues)，或通过上述方式联系我们。

segments.source_content: ### Can I still run my own DocSearch instance?

translations.zh-CN: ### 我还能运行自己的DocSearch实例吗？

segments.source_content: In favor of the new infrastructure and DocSearch v3, we will no longer maintain our beloved [DocSearch scraper](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-scraper) and [DocSearch v2](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch/tree/master), but the repositories will still be available and open to pull requests.

translations.zh-CN: 出于新基础设施和DocSearch v3的考虑，我们将不再维护我们心爱的[DocSearch爬虫](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-scraper)和[DocSearch v2](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch/tree/master)，但这些仓库仍将开放并接受Pull Request。

segments.source_content: The previous documentation (now called `legacy`) remains available as well as our [`run your own`](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/legacy/run-your-own) guide.

translations.zh-CN: 之前的文档（现称为`legacy`）以及我们的[`自主运行`指南](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/legacy/run-your-own)仍然可用。
